title: Pixel 5 SMS Notifications repeating
content:
When I open a new text message, I am getting notifications for other unread text messages again. 

Typical scenario, I send a text and they respond with "OK", I don't need to read it as I see the entire content of the message in the notification. I leave that message as unread.

Later on I get a text from someone else that requires me to open and read it. When I open this message, I get notified again (with sound and on screen notification) of the prior unread message(s)

This seem to have a started in March.

Anyone else experiencing this or know how to turn it off? I tried Google support via telephone and ended up disconnecting as I knew more about the phone than the person I was speaking with.
